alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 10:01AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Developing thunderstorms will impact portions of Essex, Norfolk, Suffolk, eastern Middlesex and northwestern Plymouth Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 1000 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking developing thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carlisle to Norfolk. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Broad rotation has been seen on radar and could result in funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Boston, Lowell, Cambridge, Brockton, Quincy, Lynn, Newton, Lawrence, Somerville, Framingham, Haverhill, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Weymouth, Revere, Peabody, Methuen, and Arlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. These storms may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
